description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Steak with Capsicum & Tomato Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: BBQ Steak with Capsicum & Tomato Relish Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green capsicum, cut into 1cm wide strips
2 red capsicum, cut into 1cm wide strips
2 medium red onions, cut into 1cm-thick wedges
6 roma tomatoes, deseeded and cut into 1-2cm dice (pre-prepped in bowl)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine Worcestershire sauce and 1 tablespoon of oil in a large bowl. Add paprika and steaks. Season. Rub mixture all over steaks.
Cook steaks on a preheated barbecue grill for 2 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate to rest for 4 minutes.

Combine capsicum, onion, garlic, allspice and 1 tablespoon of oil in a bowl. Season. Tip onto preheated barbecue flat plate and saut√© using tongs for 2 minutes or until lightly charred. Transfer to a large bowl; add tomatoes, vinegar, chilli flakes and remaining tablespoon of oil. Season. Toss to coat.

Serve steak, thickly sliced with capsicum relish and mixed herbs if using. Tip 1: Bring steaks up to room temperature 30 minutes before cooking Tip 2: Swap the rump steaks with scotch fillet or porterhouse Tip 3: You can slice the steaks into the relish and add salad leaves for a sharing platter.
